sql:
SELECT concat(start_day,'/',start_month,'/',start_year) AS start_date, 
				concat(end_day,'/',end_month,'/',end_year) AS end_date, country_name, iso,
				location, dis_type, dis_subtype, iso, total_deaths, total_affected, total_dam, concat(year,'-',seq) AS disaster_no
		FROM public_emdat
		WHERE (start_year BETWEEN 1900 AND 2015) AND continent in ('Africa','Americas','Asia') AND dis_type in ('Drought')
		ORDER BY country_name ASC
